attributes.action: stop the various petitions regarding the re-opening of more airfields
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I looked into one of the airfields listed to be re-opened and discovered that it never had a runway or even a helicopter pad!!!  We have plenty of civil airfields, do they think everyone can afford to obtain a pilots licence and buy or hire a plane!!!

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions on other petitions.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
